mapper.select: SELECT r.role_code FROM sys_user_role ur JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND (r.status IS NULL OR r.status = 1)
SELECT r.role_code FROM sys_role r JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.username = #{username}
